Global.AboutUs__Description--Page: We have strong ties in the national academic/scientific/technological system and promote alliances between these areas for the development of tools, serving the industrial efficiency and productivity of the country.
Global.AboutUs__Title--Page: We are an Argentine company specialized in autonomous mobile robots.

Global.AimuNaviraAn500__Stats--Description: A strong and agile AMR designed to assist in moving light loads through person-to-person workflows.
Global.Contact__Description: Leave us a message for questions, custom project proposals, orders or other concerns, we will respond as soon as possible.
Global.Home__Description: Discover how Indama drives industrial efficiency with its innovative autonomous robotics technology. Our intelligent systems are designed to optimize processes and increase productivity in manufacturing and logistics.
Global.Products__Card--CustomProjects--Descript: Design, development, and implementation of custom robotics and mechatronics projects in collaboration with the client.
Global.Products__Card--AimuNaviraAn500--Descrip: Autonomous mobile robot for industrial use
Global.Products__Card--AimuTikanAT500--Descript: Autonomous mobile robot for industrial use
Global.Products__Description: We develop products designed for the well-being of people and the environment.
Global.AimuNaviraAn500__Title: Aimu Navira is a differential drive mobile robot capable of performing tasks autonomously in a semi-structured environment.
Global.AimuNaviraAn500__Description: Designed primarily for logistics tasks in material transport, whether in package distribution, material transport in a healthcare unit, or part transfer to assembly lines in industrial plants, Aimu Navira offers a flexible and reliable solution in logistical item movement tasks.
Global.AimuNaviraAn500__Description--hidden: Aimu Navira belongs to the category of Autonomous Mobile Robots or AMR for short. It differs from Automatically Guided Vehicles or AGVs mainly in that it does not require special elements for its operation such as magnetic tapes fixed to the ground. Instead, Aimu uses perception systems based on laser scanners and video cameras to capture information from the natural environment, which is fused with proprioception information through advanced localization algorithms. In this way, Aimu knows its location in the work environment and can move naturally to complete its missions.
Global.AimuNaviraAn500__Btn--ApplicationVersati: OTTO 100 moves boxes, containers, carts, and other light loads through a wide range of person-to-person workflows such as work cell delivery, line delivery, and in-process transport.
Global.AimuNaviraAn500__Btn--ConvenientlyIntegr: The integrated lift of OTTO 100 works seamlessly with carts that allow simple and cost-effective modifications to transport a wide range of items.
Global.AimuNaviraAn500__Btn--ImpressiveRuggedne: Rugged enough to withstand collisions with forklifts and continue its tasks, you can rely on OTTO 100 to move your materials in challenging manufacturing environments.
Global.AboutUs__Title: At INDAMA, we design flexible and intelligent autonomous mobile robots for the industry, with the ultimate goal of automating tasks efficiently and environmentally.
Global.AboutUs__Description: We are characterized by innovation, the incorporation of knowledge, and the development of technology for the creation of intelligent systems tailored to each need. Our commitment is to improve industrial processes through the integration of advanced technological systems, prioritizing the well-being of people and respecting the environment.
Global.AboutUs__Banner--Description: INDAMA is the solution in autonomous production logistics.
